faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Calculate your amount, contact our partner via chat, and receive cash delivery to your location.
faq.a2: Typically 30-60 minutes from order to delivery within city limits.
faq.a3: Minimum 100 USDT, maximum depends on availability (usually up to 50,000 USDT).
faq.a4: Yes. Our partner Ex24.pro is a licensed exchange with 10+ offices in Thailand.
faq.a5: Just a valid ID or passport for verification.
